0.1.0.name: s9e/text-formatter
0.1.0.description: Multi-purpose text formatting and markup library. Plugins offer support for BBCodes, Markdown, emoticons, HTML, embedding media (YouTube, etc...), enhanced typography and more.

suggest.ext-intl: Allows international URLs to be accepted by the URL filter
suggest.ext-json: Enables the generation of a JavaScript parser
suggest.ext-mbstring: Enables some optimizations in the PHP renderer
suggest.ext-tokenizer: Enables optimizations in the PHP renderer
suggest.ext-zlib: Enables gzip compression when scraping content via the MediaEmbed plugin

0.10.0.name: s9e/text-formatter
0.10.0.description: Multi-purpose text formatting and markup library. Plugins offer support for BBCodes, Markdown, emoticons, HTML, embedding media (YouTube, etc...), enhanced typography and more.

suggest.ext-curl: Improves the performance of the MediaEmbed plugin and some JavaScript minifiers
suggest.ext-intl: Allows international URLs to be accepted by the URL filter
suggest.ext-json: Enables the generation of a JavaScript parser
suggest.ext-mbstring: Improves the performance of the PHP renderer
suggest.ext-tokenizer: Improves the performance of the PHP renderer
suggest.ext-zlib: Enables gzip compression when scraping content via the MediaEmbed plugin
